common.subtitle: Online JavaScript, CSS & JSON Minifier
common.description: Minify your JavaScript, CSS and JSON code from left to right, unminify from right to left — free, fast, and private. Online minification tool with no registration required.

common.errorProcessingFiles: Error processing files. Please check your files and try again.
common.filesOrderHelp: File order can be defined by drag and drop

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Found a bug? Have a suggestion? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.getInTouchText: We're always looking to improve FastMinify. Whether you've found a bug, have a feature request, or just want to say hello, we'd love to hear from you.
contact.minificationNotWorkingText: Make sure your code is valid JavaScript or CSS. Check the browser console for errors.
contact.codeNotCopyingText: Try using the copy button or manually select and copy the text.
contact.themeNotSavingText: Check if your browser allows localStorage. Try refreshing the page.

placeholders.name: Your name
placeholders.subject: Brief description
placeholders.message: Please describe your issue or suggestion in detail...

validation.required: Please fill in all required fields.
validation.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

footer.description: Free online tool to minify code instantly — fast, modern, and privacy-friendly.

whyMinify.title: What is JavaScript and CSS code minification?
whyMinify.subtitle: JavaScript and CSS code minification is the process of removing unnecessary characters from source code without changing its functionality. This includes whitespace, comments, and shortening variable names to optimize web performance.

performance.title: File size reduction
performance.description: Minification can reduce JavaScript and CSS file sizes by 30-70%, significantly improving page load times.

bandwidth.title: Bandwidth optimization
bandwidth.description: Smaller files mean less data transfer, reducing bandwidth costs and improving user experience on slower connections.

security.title: Code obfuscation
security.description: Minified code is harder to read and reverse-engineer, providing a basic level of code protection.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Our minification tool is designed to be simple, fast and secure.

paste.title: Paste your code
paste.description: Copy and paste your code into the left editor. Our automatic detection recognizes the language.

configure.title: Configure options
configure.description: Customize minification according to your needs: compatibility, compression, optimizations.

getResult.title: Get the result
getResult.description: Your minified code appears instantly. Download or copy the result.

seoOptimization.title: SEO and Performance Optimization
seoOptimization.subtitle: Code minification directly improves your search engine ranking and your site's user experience.

codeExamples.title: Minification examples
codeExamples.subtitle: Discover how minification transforms your code to optimize performance.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: FastMinify Privacy Policy - How we handle your data

introduction.title: Data Processing
introduction.content: FastMinify processes your code locally in your browser. We do not store, collect, or transmit your code to our servers. This tool is designed to be completely private and secure.

dataCollection.title: What We Collect
dataCollection.content: We only collect anonymous usage data through:

types.analytics: Google Analytics (with your consent) - anonymous traffic statistics
types.cookies: Essential cookies for language preferences and functionality
types.ads: Advertising data via Google AdSense (no personal data collected)

types.title: Cookie types:
types.essential: Essential cookies for site functionality (always active)

retention.title: Retention period:
retention.essential: Essential cookies: session or 1 year maximum

googleServices.title: Third-Party Services
googleServices.analytics: Google Analytics: Anonymous traffic statistics (you can opt-out)
googleServices.adsense: Google AdSense: Displays advertisements (no personal data collected)

dataRights.title: Your Rights
dataRights.content: Since we don't store personal data, you can:

rights.optout: Opt-out of Google Analytics at any time
rights.cookies: Manage cookie preferences in your browser

dataSecurity.title: Security
dataSecurity.content: Your code is processed entirely in your browser and never sent to our servers. No data is stored or transmitted.

dataTransfers.title: Data transfers outside the EU
dataTransfers.content: Some of our third-party services may transfer data to countries located outside the European Union:

transfers.purpose: These transfers are necessary for the operation of our analytics and advertising services.

safeguards.title: Legal safeguards:
safeguards.adequacy: European Commission adequacy decision regarding the United States
safeguards.contractual: Standard contractual clauses approved by the European Commission

rights.title: Your rights:
rights.object: You can object to these transfers by disabling analytics cookies
rights.information: You can request information about the safeguards in place
rights.complaint: You can lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority

contact.title: Questions
contact.content: For questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through our website.

privacy.footer: This privacy policy may be updated. Check back periodically for changes.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.description: FastMinify Legal Notice - Terms of use

service.title: Service Description
service.description: FastMinify is a free online tool for minifying, beautifying, and optimizing JavaScript, CSS, JSON, and PHP code. All processing is done locally in your browser.

features.minification: JavaScript, CSS, and JSON code minification

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The FastMinify website content is protected by copyright. Your code remains your property - we never store or claim rights to your code.
intellectualProperty.warning: Important: Your code is processed locally and never sent to our servers.

liability.title: Terms of Use
liability.content: FastMinify is provided "as is" without warranty. We cannot guarantee:

limitations.damages: Absence of damages from service use

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: This site uses essential cookies for functionality and optional analytics cookies. You can manage preferences in your browser.
cookies.moreInfo: See our Privacy Policy for details.

modifications.title: Changes
modifications.content: We may update these terms at any time. Continued use constitutes acceptance of changes.

legal.footer: Use of this service implies acceptance of these terms.

notFound.title: Oops! Page Not Found
notFound.subtitle: Looks like this page went on a coffee break! ☕
notFound.description: The page you're looking for seems to have vanished into the digital void. But don't worry, even the best code sometimes has bugs!

suggestions.title: Here's what you can do:
items: Check the URL for typos (we all make mistakes!)
Go back to the homepage and try again
Use our awesome minifier while you're here
Take a deep breath and try again

fun.quote: 404: The page you're looking for is in another castle! 🏰
fun.joke: Why did the web page go to therapy? Because it had too many issues! 😄

cookies.title: Cookie Preferences
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyze site usage. You can customize your preferences below.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: Used to display relevant advertisements and measure ad performance. Required for site monetization.

hero.title: Support FastMinify
hero.subtitle: FastMinify is a free and open source project. Your support helps us maintain and improve this service.

hosting.title: Hosting and infrastructure
hosting.description: Server costs, CDN and domains to keep FastMinify accessible 24/7.

development.title: Continuous development
development.description: New features, bug fixes and regular performance improvements.

features.title: New features
features.description: Support for new languages, advanced tools and optimizations for a better user experience.

direct.title: Direct support
direct.description: Help us directly with a one-time or recurring donation.

indirect.title: Indirect support via GoMining
indirect.description: Support us indirectly by using our GoMining referral link.
indirect.disclaimer: GoMining is not a guaranteed investment. Past performance does not guarantee future results. This referral link allows us to receive a commission at no additional cost to you.

thankyou.title: Thank you for your support!
thankyou.description: Every contribution, even the smallest one, helps us keep FastMinify free and continuously improve it. Your support makes a difference for our entire developer community.
